body:
Add fuzzing syscall sandbox: detect use of unexpected syscalls when fuzzing.

This PR is based on #20487. Only the last commit is new to this PR.

Example use:

```
$ make distclean
$ ./autogen.sh
$ CC=clang CXX=clang++ ./configure --enable-fuzz --with-sanitizers=fuzzer --enable-syscall-sandbox \
      --enable-debug
$ make
$ FUZZ=netaddress src/test/fuzz/fuzz
â¦
#27639  REDUCE cov: 990 ft: 1927 corp: 136/2145b lim: 80 exec/s: 13819 rss: 47Mb L: 47/70 MS: 1 EraseBytes-
#27683  REDUCE cov: 990 ft: 1927 corp: 136/2130b lim: 80 exec/s: 13841 rss: 47Mb L: 23/70 MS: 4 CMP-ChangeByte-ShuffleBytes-EraseBytes- DE: "\x08\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00"-
ERROR: The syscall "socket" (syscall number 41) is not allowed by the syscall sandbox in thread "*unnamed*". Please report. Exiting.
terminate called without an active exception
==27953== ERROR: libFuzzer: deadly signal
â¦
    #11 0x7f11a5dd0b20 in std::terminate() (/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6+0x92b20)
    #12 0x56445a4b8cb7 in (anonymous namespace)::SyscallSandboxDebugSignalHandler(int, siginfo_t*, void*) src/util/syscall_sandbox.cpp:71:5
    #13 0x7f11a5b3189f  (/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0+0x1289f)
    #14 0x7f11a461c076 in socket /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/socket/../sysdeps/unix/syscall-template.S:78
    #15 0x7f11a461c2b0 in __opensock /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/socket/../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/opensock.c:100
    #16 0x7f11a4637fd3 in if_indextoname /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/inet/../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/if_index.c:226
    #17 0x7f11a4637abd in gni_host_inet_numeric /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/inet/getnameinfo.c:354
    #18 0x7f11a4637abd in gni_host_inet /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/inet/getnameinfo.c:389
    #19 0x7f11a4637abd in gni_host /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/inet/getnameinfo.c:422
    #20 0x7f11a4637abd in getnameinfo /build/glibc-2ORdQG/glibc-2.27/inet/getnameinfo.c:539
    #21 0x56445a321e03 in CNetAddr::ToStringIP[abi:cxx11]() const src/netaddress.cpp:580:18
    #22 0x56445a323645 in CNetAddr::ToString[abi:cxx11]() const src/netaddress.cpp:624:12
    #23 0x564459ca4405 in netaddress_fuzz_target(Span<unsigned char const>) src/test/fuzz/netaddress.cpp:74:20
â¦
artifact_prefix='./'; Test unit written to ./crash-78657a4e3dda0e9557c5a4f56dd9d19763459865
```

In this example the unexpected use of `socket` in `CNetAddr::ToString` was detected. See issue #21466.
title: fuzz: Add fuzzing syscall sandbox: detect use of unexpected syscalls when fuzzing
